meanings.definition: To move quickly and suddenly in a particular direction.
meanings.sent1: The cat will spaviet across the room when it hears a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: I spaviet to catch the bus before it leaves the stop.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to spaviet up the tree to escape the chasing dog.
meanings.sent4: The idea spaviet into my mind like a bolt of lightning.
meanings.sent5: The car spaviet down the highway, leaving a trail of dust behind.

meanings.sent1: The spaviet of the rabbit caught my attention in the field.
meanings.sent2: She made a spaviet to grab the falling vase before it broke.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected spaviet of the clown slipping on a banana peel made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His decision to quit his job was a spaviet that surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The spaviet of the falling star was a magical sight in the night sky.
